basics.name: Mukul Chourey
basics.label: Technical Project Manager/Scrum Master
basics.summary: Mukul is a senior techno-manager with 20+ years of global (UK/USA/India) work experience building software products and applications from the ground up, managing and delivering complex software projects (budget ranging $2m to $7m) in business change environments in Healthcare, Telecom, Human Resources, Financial Services and Technology organizations. Mukul works with the clients and business sponsors as a technology partner, who would decipher the requirements, build cross-functional agile teams with required domain knowledge and technology skills, facilitate technical design and architecture, deliver insight and innovation at every step of the process, and take complete ownership of the product development.

work.name: SenecaGlobal IT Services Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Driving initiatives around continuous improvement in quality, productivity and efficiency in all areas by implementing industry best practices and processes. Develop technology and domain competency resources to improve efficiency and effectiveness in delivery processes
highlights: Ownership of 10 client engagements and P&L of the group.

Launched 3 software products for clients in last 2 years. Built integrated systems using latest digital technologies, blending digital and physical experiences to deliver consistent customer decision journey across devices (mobiles, wearables, tablets, laptops), browsers and channels.
Achieved average Customer Satisfaction rating of 4.28 (on the scale of 5) over past 5 years by effectively managing multiple projects & product development initiatives.
Turned around multiple ailing accounts and retained multi-million annual revenue through effective planning and control, streamlining offshore delivery, communication and quality processes.

work.name: SHL, UK
work.summary: Undertook organization-wide adoption of Agile methodologies in SHL, from the introduction of Agile to coaching the management, product owners, product managers and software development teams. Designed and implemented strategies for driving organizational changes.
highlights: Delivered an improved SaaS platform for SHL, catering to 30 million pre-employment assessments in 30 different languages. This platform generates annual revenue of GBP 80m.
Delivered an enterprise e-Commerce platform for SHL, resulting in additional revenue of GBP12m per year.
Delivered innovative, award winning, Talent Analytics product in the field of People Intelligence.

work.name: Tata Consultancy Services
work.summary: An Agile enthusiast, Certified Scrum Master (CSM) and Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP), with more than 12 years of Agile delivery management and consulting experience.
highlights: Successfully delivered multiple Greenfield projects on web-based technologies.
Managed multi-million GBP account with a UKâ€™s leading Telecom Company.
Led multiple telecom infrastructure and BPO outsourcing bids (GBP 3m to 30m).

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi, India

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Gopal Krishnan
references.reference: I had the opportunity to work with Mukul on a year long project. What was immediately apparent was Mukul's belief and enthusiasm in agile methodologies. He was key in introducing agile to his organisation and also played a big role in helping team members getting on board with agile. I have found that as a project manager Mukul doesn't shy away from the technical details when facing a difficult problem and thus deservedly commanded respect from all members of the team. Always switched on and easy to get along, Mukul was very effective in coordinating all the stake holders, including offshore teams, and thus was instrumental in delivering the project on time, against very challenging schedule. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Mukul and given the chance, would love to work with him again.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
